Articles.Content: Can anybody tell me which folder I'm supposed to pick to update to 1.6.1.2401 when the Kerbal in the box shows up?

First, welcome to the forum @ToZeMun106, and sorry this seemed to have slipped through the cracks!

We're going to need more information, like what operating system you're on (Windows, Linux, Mac), where you got the game from (KSP store, GoG, Steam), and if you're trying to update with that incredibly outdated launcher that needs to be removed from the installers.
